title: One-To-One Property of Exponential Functions
text: For any algebraic expressions s and $$t$$, and any positive real number $$b$$ that is not equal to $$1$$, $$b^s=b^t$$ if and only if $$s=t$$.

title: Appylying the One-To-Property to the Problem
text: Both expressions have a base of $$5$$, so using the property, we see that $$2x=3x+2$$.
